name: PH_3_Wellness__Preventive_Medicine__and_Self_Care
title: PH.3 Wellness, Preventive Medicine, and Self Care (Header)
description: Assist the PHR Account Holder with maintaining his or her wellness and management of their health conditions.
purpose:
A competency of the personal health record is to encourage thoughtful, prospective management of our own health maintenance and conditions.

Example(s): The system should maintain a life-long schedule for surveillance evaluations, clinical trials, and other healthcare information-related research studies.
